title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8201.1 - Definitions as used in this Part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 8201.1 - Definitions as used in this Part

State Regulations
(a) Records shall mean those records, documents or other data which are in the custody of the council. (b) Payroll record shall mean an itemized
record setting forth the name, business address, title and salary of every
officer and employee of the council. (c) Records access officer shall mean the
executive secretary of the council or any other employee of the council
designated by the executive director to receive and respond to inquiries to
inspect for certifying the council payroll. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
8201.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
